title: Can someone help me find one of the championship themes from around season 3 or 4
body:
I checked Riot's youtube and Season 3 Worlds theme, and the AllStars theme...but I can't find this one song where it's really epic for 2 mins, then it gets quiet, then some drums kick in and it gets even more epic.

Idk if it's called Worlds or Championship or FInals theme or something
